title: PRABODHAN GOREGAON
detailsOfAchievement: Prabodhan Goregaon was established in 1972. Prabodhan Goregaon is a non-profit organization dedicated to enlightening the people and provide services for the Health Care and Welfare of the society at a nominal cost. Prabodhan means Awareness through Education. Keeping in mind the social interests and public welfare many ventures have been undertaken , and this includes the establishment of Prabodhan Kridabhavan (Sports Complex), Prabodhan Joggerâ€™s Park, Ozone Swimming Pool and Activity Center, Maasaheb Meenataai Thackeray Blood Bank & Prabodhan Raktavahini (Mobile Blood Collection Van), Prabodhankar Thakare Library and Medicine Bank. Prabodhan Goregaon has always abided by its basic principle of serving the society in nurturing Art-sports as well as Spreading Knowledge through Social Welfare. All activities are undertaken to enhance the progress at cultural, health & fitness, academic and intellectual levels irrespective of any kind of differences in Religion, caste, creed and language. Prabodhan is recognized as Landmark in field of Sports training. Number of socio-cultural activities and events have been successfully organized by trust which has given us recognition of Event Organizers in Peopleâ€™s mind.
